text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump I saw an Enquirer article at the supermarket today claiming Coronavirus was engineered by the Chinese to kill us. That's a tabloid of course and the Presidency stoops to the same low in promoting themselves by demonizing foreigners, as racist Trump has been doing all along.
